title: Invitation to a workshop on contestability implementation guidelines (NIAUR - Northern Ireland Authority for Utility ...
text: ( Source : NIAUR - Northern Ireland Authority for Utility Regulation) Invitation to a workshop on contestability implementation guidelines 14/ 10/15 Today the Utility Regulator published a contestability implementation guidelines consultation
